title: The Death of Ivan Ilyich and Other Stories
description: By the time he dies, Ivan Ilych has come to understand the worthlessness of his life. Paradoxically, this elevates him above the common man, who avoids the reality of death and the effort it takes to make life worthwhile.Librarian's note: See alternate cover edition of ISBN 1840224533 here.
author: Leo Tolstoy
